message.content:
Reinforcement Learning, Probabilistic Methods. 

Reinforcement learning is the main focus of the paper, as it discusses the Markov decision process (MDP) formalization of reinforcement learning and proposes a Q-learning-like algorithm for finding optimal policies in a multi-agent setting. 

Probabilistic methods are also present, as the environment in the Markov games framework is defined by a probabilistic transition function, and the optimal policy in the simple two-player game described in the paper is probabilistic.
